name: Lost Together (GMTK 2021)
description:
// INSTRUCTIONS

Find your way to the blue exit for each connected node in each zone. Use the grey blocks to assist you in your strategy.

W A S D - move node

SPACE - switch zone

LEFT MOUSE - lock/unlock grey block

R - reset puzzle

N - new puzzle

ESC - return to main menu

// CREDITS

Design / Code - Chris Jaroszko
@jarossco

Music - tabula rasa by the Young Philosopher's Club
https://youngphilosophers.bandcamp.com/releases

A GMTK Game Jam 2021 submission
https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021
